snippet: Jeff Morgan, 59, whose childhood home had a Christmas tree, said making acclaimed wines under the Covenant label sent a “wayward Jew like me back to Judaism.”
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column describes way in which Jeff Morgan, man behind Covenant label of California wines, was led back to Judaism by his making of kosher wine.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Morgan, 59, whose childhood home had a Christmas tree, said making acclaimed wines under the Covenant label sent a “wayward Jew like me back to Judaism.”

headline.print_headline: Napa Maker of Prized Kosher Wine Says His Faith Came Through the Vine
headline.seo: Napa Maker of Covenant Kosher Wine Says Work Led to Faith
headline.main: Napa Maker of Prized Kosher Wine Says His Faith Came Through the Vine
